name: Sean Shepard
coverLetter: I have been growing recreationally for over 3 years and can trim a pound of good quality cannabis in 4-5 hours. My passion for the plant comes from delivering the ultimate medicine to those in need, and the feeling of purpose that comes from bringing people the blessing of cannabis' effects. I have offered a helping hand in half a dozen grows and helped trim over a dozen harvests of both indoor and outdoor.
